rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An open, welcoming area with Vastu-aligned orientation to greet positive energy. Designed to be wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and views. Vastu-aligned positioning to promote social interaction.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and living room; designed as a multi-functional space with Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, functional kitchen area aligned according to Vastu for prosperity and health. Equipped with wheelchair accessible cabinetry.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom featuring a spacious balcony for relaxation and fresh air, with floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu-aligned to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with a private balcony. Floor-to-ceiling windows ensure ample natural light and ventilation. Vastu-compliant for balance and calm.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: An immersive entertainment space featuring soundproofing and adjustable seating. Designed to be wheelchair accessible with Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Dedicated utility and storage space designed with Vastu guidelines for cleanliness and organization.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance ensuring compliance with Vastu and modern accessibility norms.

openings.name: Balcony Doors
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling sliding doors leading out onto spacious balconies. Designed for easy access and adherence to Vastu alignment.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light while meeting safety standards and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: One of the two remaining bedrooms designed with spacious balcony for leisure. Floor-to-ceiling windows and wheelchair accessible features ensure compliance with Vastu.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Another bedroom with a balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu-aligned for harmony and energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom with necessary fixtures for ease of movement. Vastu principles ensure a balanced environment.

rooms.name: Closet Area
rooms.description: Additional storage space aligned with Vastu for organizational clarity and ease of access.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Dedicated balcony door openings for each bedroom ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows that provide natural light and ensure compliance with Vastu.
